ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: Shouldn t work, as all crucial info is stored server side (like UO, and unlike Diablo). This is what allowed people to hack Diablo, but not UO (as far as
ygData.messageBody:
Shouldn't work, as all crucial info is stored server side (like UO, and
unlike Diablo). This is what allowed people to hack Diablo, but not UO (as
far as character stats). Might work for some other things though, like
getting into closed zones or something, who knows.

I'm a little surprised no one has hacked the graphics files and come out
with a way to modify the files PC side to take away some affects, such as
night, blindness, spell effects, rain, etc. I remember when I played UO,
someone hacked the graphics and I ran this program that took away all walls
and roofs of all structures, so you could see inside (wall was still there,
you could only SEE inside). Quite funny though walking around seeing
everyone's thousands of reagants they had gotten from duping... *sigh*



-----Original Message-----
From: Michael Ott [mailto:mott@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 4:03 PM
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] possible big cheat for EQ....


From: Michael Ott <mott@...>

Fairly easily and seemingly possible idea for this why not try
networking....logging on but before actually playing the game while on news
screen try replacing the files. That way you crack the file replace the
actual file right before logging on and wen their servers go to pull the
info bingo they pull the cracked file. Real quick real easy and you have a
super pumped character. Just use another computer to place the file. There
may be the possibility of "file in use" error messages but highly unlikely
as you wouldn't be logged on as of that time.

Just an idea
